case.state: Yes! This table is awesome! You have awesome taste in tables! We're all gonna cum so hard!
Welcome to Casa de Orendi. Who's up for board games?
Seriously guys? The universe is ending and all you want to do is play strip poker? I'm so in!
Who told you where I was?!
I am, like, so happy you picked me! This is totally going to be the best game of your life!
Whatda'ya mean you picked me? I picked you! You're welcome, by the way!
Let's! Get! Naked!

Yes! It's Beatrix! I can't wait to see your tits!
I am so glad to see you, Beatrix. I got so freakin' lost on my way back to the ship!
C'mon c'mon! Let's start already!

Oh, my, god, it's you!... Oh wait, I dunno who you are.
That's right, you're playin' with me, Orendi. Get ready for this poker game to blow your face off!

Aw, come back! I wanna see you naked!

Coward!

Oh, my, god, it's Beatrix! This match is going to be the best!
Aw hell, it's the fuzz!... Well I'm not leavin', so you beat it.

Double the Orendi, double... dendry-- double endry!

You sure you wanna play this here? Like I'm not complainin', but you sure?
Ugh, a library? Who gets turned on by books?
Ugh, libraries are dumb. Who wants to have a book fight after this?
You do realize that I'm not gonna lower my voice at all while we're here, right?
Hey, wait a minute, this is just some kind of trick to get me to take a bath, isn't it? Well it's not gonna work! I'm not bathing and you can't make me!
Don't worry, fellas, I got enough hands for all of you!
Don't worry, fellas, I got enough hands for all of you, and almost enough holes!
Ever play strip poker against a Varimorph before? 'Cause I totally am one of those things and it's going to be awesome!
You're all going down! You'll never defeat me and my fanciful diner manners!
Hi, I'm Orendi. Thank you so much for inviting us. We hardly get out anymore and oh my god, I love this kitchen.
I know what'cher thinkin' and no, I'm not here to hurt people. I wanna watch people masturbate and maybe masturbate too! I'm into more than just violence, ya know!
Hi my name is Orendi and I like to break things and hurt people but I also like to see titties and cum to them so let's do this!
Why do you people from other planets bother with long names? "Hi, I'm Orendi." See how easy that is? One name? No extra stuff?
I, uh... Guess I don't need cards.

What, me? Give cards? And ruin this hand? What am I, crazy?
Hey, dealer, gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, or I will eat your face!
~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please!
Gimme ~cards.text~.
~cards.text~! Now!

Haha ha ha!
Four out of five voices in my head agree, this hand is awesome!
No! What a terrible hand!... Nah. Just playin'. My hand rules!
Ha! Look at this hand! I told you the dealer loves me!
Fuck these cards! That's not a threat, that's a ♪promise♪!
Aw man, all I have is a 10 and a bunch of letters. I lost for sure!
No pairs... no numbers in order... not even two colors! I've totally lost!
Stupid cards! I know how to count! I don't need your help!
It doesn't matter how good my hand is. It'll never bring back my hat!

Ahaha ha ha! Good cards, good cards!
I know you wanna get a load of my luscious lady lumps, but you're gonna have to wait another round!

Haha ha ha! No Orendi crotch for you~!
This hand, is, awesome!

Hey guys, you dare me to eat all of the cards?!
Hey! These cards remind me of Pendles! They're all squiggly, just like he is!

Welp. Two twins and a pile of ass.

Sweet! A full house! That's when you have five cards, right?
Don't you guys just looove mediocre hands? I can't get enough of them! Why look, I have one right now! Sooo exciting!

Two of one card is, uh, it's... uh... Pair! It's a pair! I knew that!
You know, I can change my gender at will. If I lose this hand, ya'll might get an eyeful of giant Varimorph dick!
If I lose this hand, I will eat my shorts! I may or may not follow through on that...
Did I mention I'm goin' commando? You're gonna get lucky if I lose!
Hey! I was just thinking it'd be funny if I got a pair and look at this, I got a pair! I was right it is funny!

Psh, like I care if this stupid pair makes me lose, or not lose, or whatever.

This hand! It's so terrible!

Lucky you! You're gonna get a chance to see me show off some more!

I hate these cards, I hate poker, and I hate ~player~'s face!
A poem for these cards: they really really suck, seriously what the fuck, burn them in a fire, fire fire, fire fire.
Welp, guess it's gonna be 'batin' time for me soon.
I'm out!
Damn it!
You ready to see me work it? 'Cause it looks like it's time to work it!

Probably. Or maybe it's ~player~? She looks like she's hidin' somethin'!

Of course I do! Did'ja know that Varimorph's holes never start gettin' lose? They stay tight for life!

I KNEW IT! I totally smelled it comin'!
What, didn'tchu hear? The Varelsi have been consuming everything with their veil. Space used to be bigger, but then they ate it.

I gotchu, gray lady. I can make anyone cum. I once made Nova cum, and she doesn't even have a body!

Yeah, well, we're trying. It ain't goin' well, though! The Varelsi are, like, infinite!

Scalewolf hearts. Too bad no one let me go find some last time we were on Ekkunar...
My unluckiest day has to be that time me and my family got abducted by a psycho robot and our home planet got destroyed. Nothin' tops that.

Wuzzat? You wanna know more about me? I'm sorry, I thought this was strip poker, not "tell everyone about your darkened home planet, abduction by a psycho robot, and enslaved family" poker. Fuckin' weirdo.
Y'know, this is the longest I've stayed in one place without being chained down!
You really think you can take me? You really think so? Ha haha ha ha!

It's just you and me now! No going back! Nut up or shut up and nut!
It's just the two of us now! If you think I'm going down without a fight, you're wrooong!

Oh right, you humanoids like trading names. I'm Orendi.
Oh, right, names. I'm Orendi. Hope that's enough name for ya 'cause it's all the name I got.
Did I tell you my name yet? I think I forgot to tell you my name. It's Orendi.

I heard the Jennerits got this machine that makes their bodies stay the same forever. That sounds dumb. Why would you wanna stay the same forever?
What's your favorite kind of meat? Thrall tastes preeeetty good, but it's pretty hard to top Silverback Hydebear.
Isn't it funny how dirt tastes the same on every planet?... What? I don't like eating dirt, I like trying new things!

Man, I could really go for some Go-Go Juice right now. No one makes an energy drink as good as that, especially not the UPR -- their "Friction Fizz" tastes like piss.
Y'know what I don't get? The Jennerit got these "Silent Sisters," but they're not silent at all! What's up with that? I bet they're not even sisters, either!
This reminds me of a game I played with Rendain. Except it didn't involve stripping. Or cards. Actually, it was just me blasting him with Chaos Bolts.
I hate that those Minion robot guys took off. I mean sure, it's still fun to break stuff, and robots are stuff, but it's just not the same as snapping a Thrall's bones or tearing into a Mike.
I wish the stupid Varelsi would stop vanishing when they die. I wanna taste them!
I'm not gonna say the Varelsi are right to eat up the whole universe, buuut if I could eat up a whole star, I wouldn't not eat more than one.
It's so stupid how some creatures having things fall off of them when they get older, like teeth and arms and stuff. Just grow good stuff when you're born, duh!
What's the biggest thing you ever stole? I once stole a whole Arcfleet frigate. I don't even remember where I put it! I lost it in the Detritus Ring!
Hey, what kinda stuff do you do to your hair? My hair is, like, naturally all beautiful and stuff, so I don't do a thing to it!
So, what kinda porn do you guys watch? I'm not very picky, I just like watchin' bit mash together. Makes my bits want some mashin'.
Seriously, clothes are dumb! Being naked is great! Indecent exposure is a dumb law! Everyone should streak all the time!

I'm a Varimorph, and yes, my arms are really cool. Thank you for noticing!
The hell's with me? The hell's with you? You Rath's brother or somethin'?
Oh no! Tall blondie doesn't like how I talk? Woe is me!
Hey! Blondie! Shut the hell up! I can talk how I damn well please!
Sorry if I'm too crazy for you, Jura. Watching your family be enslaved and tortured by a psychotic robot tends to do that to a gal.
I didn't realize you were the boss of me, Jura. You don't have an eyepatch or a badass command gauntlet, so you'll have to forgive me.
Earth? Wuzzat? You mean, like, the dirt? What's dirt have to do with anything?
Lemme answer your question with another question: What's Earth?
Aw, this isn't a cosplay, sweety. I grew these arms!
D.Va, is it true that you're a totally not cute and super annoying rip-off of Toby?
D.Va, is it true that you're ripping off Toby's schtick and doing a bad job of it?
Coffee-whatnow? I ain't human, I can tell ya that! I'm a Varimorph! I don't blame you for not knowing, I think most of us got swept up by that psycho Marquis.
I dunno, my mama taught me not to go into Rifts with strangers, even if you are promising chaos...
Maybe it's magik? Maybe I was born this way? Maybe I just have crazy squishy DNA that lets me mold my body like a lump of clay?
Nope! These arms are one-hundred percent Orendi-made!
Pah! Guns. Why would I need guns? I am a gun! I'll take Shadowfire over bullets any day of the week, sister!
Yes I am! I totally am magick and that's why people love me!
I'm better than human! I'm a Varimorph!
You thought I was a fairy? Where's Sangvis at anyway? Probably in a darkened system by now, huh?
Stupid LLC, always tryin' to sell me somethin'...
Yeah, well, it must be broken, 'cause I am a witch! Maybe I'm just so strong a witch that I broke your detector?
Uh, well let's see... Varimorphs are shapeshifters, we can look like whatever we want but choose human-ish forms 'cause it's easier to communicate that way... Uh, anything else you wanna know?
Do I look like I'm not happy with what I look like? Maybe if you're lucky I'll grow a dick later, but that depends!
Ninja kid? You mean Pendles? I'm not dressed as him, I'm dressed as me!
Whoa! You don't leave the house much, do you? I'm the first alien you've ever seen? Like, seriously, wow!
Wha? Why would I be? I'm choosing to be here.
Me again? Crap.
Again already? What're you, like a clothe glutton or somethin'?
Yes! Me again! I'm gonna be naked in no time!
Damn it! Me again? Fine!
Don't lie, you guys just wanted to see me fuck myself, didn'tcha? It's obvious because you rigged the cards!
Damn it! Believe it or not, but I actually wanted to win!
You think I'm afraid to show a crowd my tits? You're wrong, that's what I'm here for!
I lost? Don't care! Still winning anyway!
I lost? Oh well I'm still in the lead!
Wow, you guys reeeeally suck if I'm winning right now.
Okay, for realsies guys, how am I winning right now?
Hell yeah! Orendi is in the lead!... This is a race, right?...
Y'know, there's this thing called "winning" that I'd totally like to be doing right now!
I happen to like being naked anyway!
I didn't lose, you lost! Getting naked is the point of the game, so therefore, I'm winning!
I can answer those questions for you: yes, I'm a monster, and we're only fighting if you want to be!
Me first me first me first!
I'm first! That's a good sign for the rest of the game, right?
I'm first! That means I'm the best at this game, right?
Psh, fine, like I care that I'm first. I wanna get naked anyway!

Man, you guys suck at this!

You guys know I actually want to take my clothes off, right? Like, did I make that clear enough, or do you just suck at poker?

My turn? Is it my turn? It's my turn now, right?
Everyone shut up! It's my turn now!
♪My turn!♪
My tuuuuurn!
Orendi is up to bat!
Alright, who's next?... Why is everyone staring at me?
My turn again? Cool. Coooooool.
Wait, you mean to tell me that this hand isn't the best one possible?
Psh, whatever. I hate pants anyway!
Titties weren't enough for ya, huh? You dirty pervs, I love you!
You ready? You ready for some Varimorph vag? You sure you can handle it?
Yes! I'm being included! I love being included!
Yes! I get to do the part of the game I came for!
Damn. And here I was hoping I'd get to get freaky fully clothed.

Hey! Don't dis the arms! They let me be twice as productive, especially at murder!
Oh yeah? How's about I roast your ass and then we see if you still doubt my magical prowess?
Hey, I may be crazy, but I still know the planets that left, and "Earth" ain't one of 'em!
Hey, that's a pretty accurate description, greenie!

They look real 'cause they are real, duh! And before you ask, my boobs are real too.
Hey, I should just be thankful that I'm taking all of them off at once!

Pokemon? I mean I can poke you if you want, but I already told you I'm a Varimorph and I already have a name. Is "Pokemon" just what you call aliens on your planet? On Etra II we just call them "aliens."
Even if that's true -- which is isn't -- you gotta admit, I'm pretty smart for mimicking the lasers without knowing how they work, right?
Open your listening tubes, I just said I'm a Varimorph. Duh. I got these arms 'cause I wanted them.
I'm not changin' my outfit. Rogue orange for life!
Y'know, those rich assholes... who're always tryin' to sell somethin'. The LLC. You know. Those guys.
Yeah, well, Kyoko just has bad taste. I say I'm not wearing nearly enough spikes!
I am a witch! I am I am I am! And I don't wanna take off my sweet witch hat but I gotta!
Hey, "monster" is subjective! And not every Varimorph is as fun as I am. Speaking of fun, wanna see my titties?
Are you sayin' my titties are outta this world? Because you're totally right!
I'm from Etra II. There was so much variety to it, and everyone all looked different, and there weren't so many rules everywhere. It was great! Until the stupid Varelsi ate my star...
You think so small, Sayaka. Shapeshifting means I can grow a dick. Question is, do I have one now...?
